{{ja-kanjitab|たん|か|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From ''tan'' ([[丹]], [[cinnabar]] red, [[vermilion]], [[red]]) + ''ka'' ([[花]], [[flower]], [[blossom]])

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|たんか}}
# [[red]] [[flower]]
# a metaphor for the red lips of a beautiful woman
